title: OT-feature locl not works in InDesign
author: Henyk

comments.content:
I think it is normal.  
I'm not saying that your code is correct, but from what I heard,  
despite some of the Pro fonts containing the locl feature, the latest  
version of InDesign, CS2, still does not support it yet.  
But keep the feature in your font, because future versions will.
I believe InDesign does not support the language tag.
See **page 14** of [Adobe’s OT User’s Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026045034/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/pdfs/OTGuide.pdf) for a list of currently supported features.

Yup, it's not supported yet. Perhaps in a future version.

As a reminder, you can request features directly by using the form here: [http://www.adobe.com/support/feature.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026045034/http:/www.adobe.com/support/feature.html "http://www.adobe.com/support/feature.html")

Cheers,

T

What, it hasn't been added yet! Egads!

You'd think we were busy or something. :)
